outputs.output_descr:
Formulate a national policy and national programme, along with a pragmatic implementation approach, to support this transformation process. an initial gap analysis will lead to initial recommendations for various initiatives and policies, while ensuring that these are completely integrated with ongoing national and other efforts. More specific objectives :

•	Conduct a gap analysis of Bahrain's readiness for KBS
•	Recommend specific initiatives and policies that can form part of a national policy and programme, to enable Bahrain to transition to a KBS.
